name: places/ChIJo3Ol26JZwokR5w6OulwLJG0
formattedAddress: 15 W 27th St 9th floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 15 W 27th St 9th floor, New York, NY 10001-7711, USA

originalText.text:
I was looking for a modular sofa to fit in my back room. I saw some options out there but they were kinda bland until I found the Burrow Range sofa. I love Scandinavian interiors and this sofa had a unique stylish look while being super versatile.  It was super easy to assemble. It took my partner and me around 30 minutes to build. I also like the little details. The items to build the sofa came in these neat little pouches made of the same fabric color as the sofa - talk about upcycling!

The sofa is a nice balance of soft/firm sit. Not too soft where you sink in and not too firm where it would be uncomfortable. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a modular sofa without sacrificing style.

The sofa is a nice balance of soft/firm sit. Not too soft where you sink in and not too firm where it would be uncomfortable. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a modular sofa without sacrificing style.

originalText.text: Do not buy from this company! We purchased a nomad sectional with two ottomans. It kept getting delayed (fine), when it eventually arrived we were thrilled and put a section of it together. It had an awful chemical smell. We left it for two days while we went away and came back and the entire house smelled awful. We have been trying to return our couch for over two weeks with a runaround from their customer service. Three days after it arrived it was packed and ready to go back. The only way to contact customer service is through email or text- you can’t call. We filled out a return form, and have emailed and texted their customer service several times with a response “we are sending return labels by xx date.” Nothing. So now we have this couch in our garage in boxes for over two weeks, no return labels or money back. We are reporting to BBB and have to go the route of talking to our bank to try to get our $$ back. DO NOT use this company.

originalText.text: I've had a Range sofa for almost 3 years now and it's held up great! It's definitely a cooler looking sofa that's more for casual seating and not like one of those super fluffy / super deep "pillow" sofas you see all over instagram (IMO these look used and terrible after sitting on them for a year). I wanted something that would look cool in my living room and not take up my entire living room, so this is a good fit for me. I really like that I can change around the orientation for different set ups. My family loves to make a "pit" for movie nights. I'm a pretty handy person, so I'm comfortable taking it apart and reassembling it, but if you don't like working with your hands, that might not be your jam.

originalText.text: We have never bought a sofa online and we had concerns... No need for those concerns, however. The sofa arrived on time and it was very easy to put together. It is absolutely perfect for our space!

text.text: We have never bought a sofa online and we had concerns... No need for those concerns, however. The sofa arrived on time and it was very easy to put together. It is absolutely perfect for our space!

originalText.text:
As several others have stated, I too wish I had checked the BBB reviews and Google reviews before purchasing this couch. The only review I read was New York Times wire cutter. Someone should alert the New York Times people about how wrong they are.

My couch arrived missing the hardware required to put it together- hardware that should have been installed on the sections before it was delivered. There must be no quality control.. I emailed support more than a week ago and have had no response except the auto reply. They claim the year-end sale is slowing their response time but if you scan these reviews you’ll see they are always explaining their poor response time, with one excuse or another.

I’ve searched and searched for a phone number for customer support, and have not found one.

Though all I need is hardware at the moment, seeing these reviews of the quality makes me want to start all over and return the product.

After years of getting the same complaints, one  would expect this company to have solved its communications issues with customers. Polite responses on Google review that are signed “warmly“ do not suffice.
